name: MA2-BN
query:
SELECT sa.cg_utr_number as sa_cg_utr, sa.cg_formatted_utr_number as sa_cg_formatted_utr , sa.claim_id as sa_claim_id ,sa.paid_date as sa_paid_date, tcb.al_number  as al_id ,tcb.final_bill_number as claim_bill_no, tcb.claim_submitted_date as claim_sub_date, tb.name as bill_no FROM tabBill tb,tabClaimBook tcb , `tabSettlement Advice` sa ,tabMatcher tm
WHERE tm.sales_invoice=tb.name and tm.claimbook=tcb.name and tm.settlement_advice=sa.name and tm.match_logic in ("MA2-BN");
